title: See you at the pillar
brief_description: A sentimental journey around the capital city of Ireland showing the fine Georgian mansions, the people of Dublin at work, around the city, in the public gardens and at the zoo. Points out that the city is fast becoming another modern capital. Narrated by Anthony Quayle, Norman Rodway.
